annotations.description: The Whiskey Smash has been popular for well over a century it made it's print debut in Jerry Thomas' Bon Vivant's Guide around 1862. But Thomas doesn't actua...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Bourbon Smash

textContent:
2oz or 60ml of Bourbon
.5oz or 15ml simple syrup
Pinch of Mint (6 - 8 leaves)
4 Lemon Wedges
1 Cube Sugar

Shake and open pour into rocks glass. 
Top with crushed ice
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_UjmW28FQcI
title: Bourbon Smash
